column5: Well I finally moved from Port Hope to Delta, Ontario, a tiny village in the heart of the Rideau lakes. I can see the lake across a meadow from my house and its only 300 meters away with a nice boat ramp. Ill post some pictues of the area as soon as I find out which box I packed the camera in. There are about 10 lakes within 15 minutes of my place and they cover everything from Pike, Pickeral, Bass, Musky and lake trout so that should keep me busy for some time to come. Ive got to go. My wife wants me to start painting. OH GOD!
Sooooo.................what yer saying is that was your one minute of "down time", to make this post, right,  Glad you found your little piece of heaven Ed, enjoy it.
Congrats Eddyk!  Enjoy!  Whopper
Hey Ed...Pull a "Tom Sawyer" on your brother Lew and maybe he will help paint...   Enjoy your retirement home...sounds like what we have ...

Better break out the brushes and tools in a hurry! It will be time to go fishing before you know it. Get it all done now so you will have more time to enjoy the water.  Gongratulations on the new abode. Sounds like an ideal location.
Sounds nice Eddy, I'm sure you and the missus won't regret it....look forward to the pictures.  Maureen
Congrats Ed, sounds like a great place !!  Look forward to the pics.

Congrats on the move EddyK.  We had to paint every room in the house when we moved in last Spring.  I was so dang sick of painting after that ... I don't want to look at another brush.  Lots of bass dishing around those parts.  I'll be sure to honk as I pass by on Rt. 15 to Rideau Ferry this July.
maybe we can hook up this spring/ summer my mother and law lives in newboro near westport  and her father lives in dealta
Sounds awesome, congratulations Eddy!
Way tp go Eddy   Just remember to take some time for yourself in between the painting!  Looking forward to seeing some of those pictures when you get the chance.
Congratulations Eddy! Enjoy!
Congrats Eddy! sounds like a nice place to be!
Congrats Eddy.  Get the painting and "Honey Do" list out of the way now to clear the way for fishing.
Eddy, you are not too far from me, we should hook up this year for sure!  congrats on the retirement and the new place, you will love it
Thanks for all the positive comments.
Congrats and enjoy Eddie. Hope to see some reports in the upcoming season.
Great move Eddy!  I'm sure you won't be dissapointed on your move, only too bad you will be so far away form the Ganny now. I think you upgraded mind you!  ...Ron

very nice Love that area.... with the Herseys chocolate  plant closing and the regional center closing that areas two biggest employers maybe I will be able to buy down that way when prices start to drop.......lol
Sounds like pure heaven!! Well, except for the painting thing...LOL.  Cant wait to see the pics....and dream that one day bly and I will be in the same position!
Is delta near to westport?
Bookoobeast. Yes. Delta is  about 15 minutes east of Westport.
Hey Eddy, is it true Lew is handy with the paintbrush ??
